Live sessions are only available for Mimo Max subscribers
Sessions range from beginner-friendly to more advanced topics
All live sessions will be held over Zoom. It’s recommended to join from a desktop computer.
You can now join weekly live sessions to supplement your learning
Mimo helped me get the skills needed to get my first software development job, as well as the confidence to apply in the first place.
I would not have gotten ready for a web developer position if I hadn’t attended the Mimo Bootcamp courses.
It wasn’t just the technology that Mimo offered. What I gained from the course was the ability to better understand coding and how to work on a project.
I highly recommend Mimo to anyone looking to learn Web Development. I promise you will not regret it.
If you finish a Mimo career path, you’ll receive a verifiable certificate to show to potential employers
Earn a certificate, build a portfolio, and get hired
Max gives you full access to our desktop version, which is a great place to apply your coding skills
